hero.title: Leone Pavan Developments
hero.subtitle: Commitment, quality and excellence since 2004.
hero.intro: Since 2004, when it started its activities, Leone Pavan Developments has taken a serious approach to every project. With highly qualified professionals, first-rate materials and state-of-the-art technology, we constantly evolve and refine our processes.

intro.text: Since 2004, when it started its activities, Leone Pavan Developments has assumed a serious stance with each project executed. Operating in the construction market with highly qualified professionals, using first-rate raw materials and state-of-the-art technology, we evolve and improve our knowledge constantly.

history.title: Our journey in construction
history.text: Founded in May 2004 in Balneário Camboriú, Leone Construtora e Incorporadora — Leone Pavan Developments — blends industrial technology with handcrafted care. We operate on the Santa Catarina coast focusing on mid- and high-standard residential projects, leading the full cycle: technical site scouting, design, execution and delivery, with top-tier materials, qualified teams and architectural innovation to ensure safety, value and well-being.

foundation.text: Foundation in Balneário Camboriú/SC, focused on residential projects.

mirante.text: SPE for Mirante do Atlântico, a milestone in high-standard projects overlooking the sea.

consolidation.text: Consolidation in BC with deliveries such as Vila Esperança and Portal dos Municípios.

bombinhas.text: Expansion to Bombinhas with Palazzo del Mare, steps from the beach.

today.text: Mature portfolio in SC, stronger digital presence and new launches around BC/Balneário Shopping.

mission.description: Build with technical excellence and ethics, turning investments into safe homes and projects that enhance Santa Catarina's urban landscape.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Be recognized as the most reliable builder on the Santa Catarina coast, known for on-time delivery and careful finishing.

values.title: Values
values.description: Tradition, transparency in relationships, financial solidity, and construction rigor at every stage.

differential.title: Why choose Leone Construtora?
differential.text: We go beyond key handover: our focus is on consistent, reliable real estate assets. Commitment to quality, transparency and responsibility to ensure peace of mind for investors and comfort for residents.

items.locations: Privileged locations: sites strategically positioned in areas with sound appreciation and established views across Santa Catarina’s main coastal cities.
items.quality: Construction rigor and finishing: modern methods with careful detailing, recognized-brand materials and specialized workforce.
items.transparency: Transparency and security: clear legal and document tracking at every stage, with ongoing reporting to investors.
items.sustainability: Urban sustainability: projects designed to harmonize with surroundings, comply with environmental rules and foster responsible city development.

balneario.title: Balneário Camboriú
balneario.text: A city full of charms, Balneário Camboriú daily presents its residents and visitors with exuberant beauty. Natural landscapes ranging from beaches to Atlantic Forest, combined with excellent infrastructure, make the city a vibrant place full of life — an excellent choice both to live and invest.

closing.title: Follow the Future of Our Story
closing.text: For more than two decades, Leone Construtora has transformed Santa Catarina's skyline with projects synonymous with safety and sophistication. We invite you to explore our delivered developments and upcoming launches, where every square meter is planned to exceed expectations and elevate your lifestyle.
